name: SituationalAwarenessforNovelEpidemicResponse
title: Situational Awareness for Novel Epidemic Response

resource.name: Audit Event Write Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints on the AuditEvent Resource to record when a resource has been written.

resource.name: Bed Group Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints on the Group Resource for data communicating about Bed availability.

resource.name: Bed Location Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints on the Location Resource for data communicating about a location for a bed.

resource.name: Bed MeasureReport Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints on the MeasureReport Resource for reporting summary data about Bed availability.

resource.name: Device Group Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints on the Group Resource for data communicating about device availability.

resource.name: Audit Event Read
resource.description: Defines constraints on the AuditEvent Resource to record when a record has been accessed.

resource.name: Device MeasureReport Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints on the MeasureReport Resource for data communicating about device availability.

resource.name: Resource Location Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints on the Location Resource describing the location of resources (Beds and Devices).

resource.name: Supporting Device Profile
resource.description: Defines constraints on the Device Resource for data communicating about supporting devices.

resource.name: Bed Location Operational Status
resource.description: This Value Set is used to indicate whether a bed is in use (O), available for use (U), or not available (C) for use.

resource.name: Bed Property
resource.description: This value set describes other properties of a bed, such as the ability to support isolation.

resource.name: Bed Type
resource.description: This Value Set describes the types of care services that a bed can support.

resource.name: Resource Fields
resource.description: This value set describes fields used to stratify groups in a report

resource.name: Device Resource Field Names
resource.description: This Coding System identifies legal field names in a FHIR R4 Device Resource.

resource.name: Location Resource Field Names
resource.description: This Coding System identifies legal field names in a FHIR R4 Location Resource.

resource.name: Bed Type Coding System
resource.description: This Coding System fills gaps describing types of care services that a bed can support.

resource.name: SANER Population Measure Groups
resource.description: Groups defined by The SANER Project for measure populations

resource.name: Bed Availability and Use Reporting
resource.description: This measure demonstrates reporting on bed availability and use at a facility location based on CDC/NHSN reporting requirements.

resource.name: Laboratory Orders and Results Cumulative Reporting
resource.description: This measure demonstrates reporting about Daily Laboratory Testing at a inpatient test sites based the Vice President Pence Letter to Hospital Administrators.

resource.name: Suspected or Confirmed COVID-19 Patient Reporting
resource.description: This measure demonstrates reporting about suspected or confirmed patients at a facility location based on CDC/NHSN reporting requirements.

resource.name: Laboratory Orders and Results Daily Increase Reporting
resource.description: This measure demonstrates reporting about Daily Laboratory Testing at a inpatient test sites based the Vice President Pence Letter to Hospital Administrators.

resource.name: Bed Availability and Use Reporting
resource.description: This measure demonstrates reporting on bed availability and use at a facility location based on CDC/NHSN reporting requirements.

resource.name: Laboratory Orders and Results Daily Increase Reporting
resource.description: This measure demonstrates reporting about Daily Laboratory Testing at a inpatient test sites based the Vice President Pence Letter to Hospital Administrators.

resource.name: Mechanical Ventilators Reporting
resource.description: This measure demonstrates reporting on ventilator availability and use at a facility location based on CDC/NHSN reporting requirements.

resource.name: Covid Confirmed or Suspected Deaths in any hospital or ED Location

Covid Confirmed or Suspected Patients on Ventilation

Covid Confirmed or Suspected Patients in ED or Overflow awaiting Inpatient Bed
